text: Hrag Varoujan YedalianCalifornia Birth Index (born December 14, 1981 in Los Angeles County, California) is an Armenian-American documentary film director and producer.Wood, Sura (2007), "Low-budget documentary shines a light on a lesser known hero of the Left and puts him in the context of his times", The Hollywood Reporter. Retrieved on 2 December 2008.Turpin, Andy (2007), "Fade to Black Lion", The Armenian Weekly. Retrieved on 2 December 2008. He is a graduate of the University of California, Berkeley and has attended UCLA School of Law and the AFI Conservatory. ==Filmography== *The People's Advocate: The Life and Times of Charles R.
